channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Timeline: Trump administration's words as critics press for Epstein records
item.description: The Trump administration has shifted its tone and message in response to persistent pressure about the Epstein records — especially from supporters wh...

item.title: These programs help poor students with college. Trump wants to pull the funding
item.description: For 60 years, TRIO has helped millions of people along the path to a degree, but the administration says it is no longer needed.

item.title: She's cared for America's elderly for decades. Trump wants her gone by Sept. 8
item.description: The Trump administration has moved to end temporary protected status for immigrants from Honduras and other countries. Among them are health care work...

item.title: Offered a cash price for a prenatal genetic test? It may be your best bet
item.description: An expectant mom got a $750 bill for a blood test to check for genetic abnormalities in her baby. Then she tried to figure out why it was so high.

item.title: Trump DOJ hired lawyer who compared Jan. 6 prosecutions to the Holocaust
item.description: Before joining the Justice Department this year, attorney Jonathan Gross said Jan. 6 prosecutors were "evil people. They will put you on a cattle car ...

item.title: Former Thai PM Thaksin acquitted in royal insult case
item.description: The former PM's lese majeste charge relates to an interview he did with a South Korean newspaper years ago.

item.title: Hurricane Erin still a danger to swimmers at many East Coast beaches
item.description: Meteorologists are closely tracking the projected path of Hurricane Erin, the first hurricane to develop over the Atlantic this year.

item.title: 8/21: The Daily Report
item.description: Jericka Duncan reports on two states' progress in redistricting plans, and the larger impact of rapid climate change in Antarctica.

item.title: Federal data website outage raises concerns among advocates
6 found dead during confined space rescue at Northern Colorado dairy farm
item.description: Six people were found dead Wednesday evening at a dairy farm in Northern Colorado, officials said.

item.title: 8/21: The Takeout with Major Garrett
item.description: President Trump surveying National Guard policing in D.C.; Couple wrongly accused of kidnapping hoax helps solve cases connected to abductor.

item.title: Lil Nas X arrested and taken to hospital after wandering LA streets in underwear
item.description: The LAPD allege the singer "charged" at them and was placed under arrest on suspicion of battery.

item.title: Gaza City will be razed if Hamas does not agree our terms, Israel minister says
item.description: Hamas should disarm and release all Israeli hostages, Israel Katz says, as country prepares a massive attack on Gaza City.

item.title: 8/21: CBS Evening News
item.description: Hurricane Erin lashes Outer Banks with coastal flooding and strong winds; When Mona Lisa was stolen from the Louvre

item.title: Sri Lanka's former president Ranil Wickremesinghe arrested
item.description: Ranil Wickremesinghe has been arrested in connection with the alleged misuse of funds, officials said.

item.title: India top court shelves plan to lock up Delhi's street dogs
item.description: The Supreme Court says only dogs with rabies or aggressive behaviour should be kept in shelters.

item.title: Defamation case against Fox News highlights role of its hosts in promoting 2020 election falsehoods
Florida must stop expanding ‘Alligator Alcatraz’ immigration center, judge says
item.description: A federal judge has issued a preliminary injunction halting further expansion of an immigration detention center built in the middle of the Florida Ev...
